parameters.name: Accounts
parameters.description:
The accounts that you want to add. The value is a JSON array. Valid values:

*   AccountId: the IDs of the accounts.

*   Imported: specifies whether to add the accounts. Valid values:

    *   0: no
    *   1: yes

parameters.name: AutoImported
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to automatically add the account for which the logging feature is configured. Valid values:

*   1: yes
*   0: no

parameters.name: CloudCode
parameters.description:
The code that is used for multi-cloud environments. Valid values:

*   qcloud: Tencent Cloud
*   aliyun: Alibaba Cloud
*   hcloud: Huawei Cloud

parameters.name: LogCodes
parameters.description: The logs that you want to collect. The value is a JSON array.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description:
The data management center of the threat analysis feature. Specify this parameter based on the region where your assets reside. Valid values:

*   cn-hangzhou: Your assets reside in regions inside China.
*   ap-southeast-1: Your assets reside in regions outside China.

parameters.name: RoleFor
parameters.description: The ID of the account that you switch from the management account.

parameters.name: RoleType
parameters.description:
The type of the view. Valid values:
- 0: the current Alibaba Cloud account
- 1: the global account
